bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of serious injuries inflicted upon the five depots, with tu xue 吐血 , blood spitting, assuming an appearance of blood gushing from the victim’s mouth. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hua rui shi 花蕊石 quoting Shi yao shen shu 十藥神書 : 五臟崩損 , 涌噴血出成升斗 , “Collapse injuries of the five depots, with the quantity of blood gushing filling sheng and dou -measures”, writes: 五內崩損 , 噴血出斗升 , “ The five internal collapse injuries , with the quantity of blood gushing filling dou - and sheng -measures”.
